introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Dragon Tiger is one of the simplest gambling games. It is essentially a two-card version of baccarat. To explain further, two cards are dealt, one for Dragon and one for Tiger. Players bet on which side will have the higher value.

goal.title: GAME GOAL
goal.content: The goal of the Dragon Tiger game is to predict the side with the highest card value or closest to the number 13 (Player, Banker, or Tie).

rules.title: GENERAL RULES
steps: The game will be led by the Dealer.
This game uses 8 sets of cards in a single Shoe.
At the start of each new Shoe, the Dealer will draw one card to determine how many cards will be Burned or discarded. A maximum of 13 cards can be discarded.
After the betting time is over, the Dealer will deal one card to Dragon and one to Tiger.
The hand with the highest card value wins.
If the result is a tie, half the bets on Dragon and Tiger are returned. Tie bets only win if Dragon and Tiger have the same value.
All side bets lose if the result is 7.

dragon.title: Dragon
dragon.description: Pays if Dragon's card value is higher than Tiger's

tiger.title: Tiger
tiger.description: Pays if Tiger's card value is higher than Dragon's

tie.title: Tie
tie.description: Pays if Dragon and Tiger have the same card value

side-bet.heading: Side Bets
side-bet.note: *Side bets lose if the card value is 7

odd.title: Odd
odd.description: The result is an odd number

even.title: Even
even.description: The result is an even number
